= !ErrorMessage property =

*Project:* [ConsoleAppClasses  Console Application Runner Classes].

*Unit:* _PJConsoleApp_.

*Class:* _[TPJConsoleApp TPJConsoleApp]_.

{{{
property ErrorMessage: string;
}}}

== Description ==

This read only property stores the error message corresponding the value of _[TPJConsoleAppErrorCode ErrorCode]_, or the empty string if _[TPJConsoleAppErrorCode ErrorCode]_ is 0. If _[TPJConsoleAppErrorCode ErrorCode]_ corresponds to a Windows error then _!ErrorMessage_ stores the error description provided by Windows.
